item.title: Has United Spirits Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, United Spirits Ltd has declared a dividend of 300%, amounting to ₹8 per share, with an ex-date of January 27, 2026. While recent total returns have been negative, the company has shown significant growth over the longer term, particularly a total return of 114.78% over the past five years. Time: Jan 21 2026 11:30 PM IST

item.title: Has DCM Shriram Ltd. declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, DCM Shriram Ltd. has declared a dividend of 180%, amounting to ₹3.6 per share, with an ex-date of January 23, 2026. While recent total returns have shown volatility, longer-term returns have been more favorable. Time: Jan 21 2026 11:30 PM IST

item.title: Has Havells India Ltd. declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Havells India Ltd. has declared a dividend of 400% (₹6 per share), with an ex-date of January 23, 2026. While recent total returns have been negative, longer-term performance shows positive growth. Time: Jan 21 2026 11:30 PM IST
